title: chapter head italic font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803045403im_/http:/typophile.com/files/the-best-of-technology-writing-2006_3466.png)

Hello,

What is this font, please? It is the chapter head italic font in "The Best of Technology Writing 2006" edited by Brendan I. Koerner, ISBN-13 978-0-472-03195-5.

Many thanks,  
Eric

Font: 

 Elegant Garamond 

Solved By: 

 [defiantone](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803045403/http:/typophile.com/user/206966 "View user profile.")
